articles.content: The domestic market closed flat after hitting record highs on Friday as investors preferred to book profit at higher levels.The S&P BSE Sensex hit a record high of 75,636 while the Nifty50 hit an… [+3243 chars]

articles.title: RIL, HDFC Bank lead as India's top 10 companies add nearly ₹2 lakh crore in market cap; ITC drags - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Among the top 10 most valued firms in India, only ITC was the underperformer.
articles.content: Nine out of India's top 10 companies by market capitalisation, added 1.85 lakh crore to their market value last week, led by Reliance Industries and HDFC Bank.The week gone by saw the S&P BSE Sen… [+1440 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk Says He Is An "Alien", Claims "Nobody Believes" Him - NDTV
articles.description: Discussing aliens on Earth, he said, "People often ask me do I think aliens are on Earth, I have not seen any evidence of aliens."

articles.author: HT Auto Desk
articles.title: Jaguar Land Rover to assemble Range Rover SUVs in India, aims 22% lower price - HT Auto
articles.description: With the intended local assembling, Range Rover and Range Rover Sport will join the models like Range Rover Velar, Range Rover Evoque, Jaguar F-Pace and Discovery Sport, which are already assembled locally in India.
articles.content: Till now the British luxury car marque has produced the Range Rover and Range Rover Sport in JLR's Solihull plant in the UK and then exported to around 121 countries globally, including India. Howeve… [+1835 chars]
